storyInfo: Elysium is in a town working to become a Messenger, but danger creeps near.

attributes.content: Letter for you! I'll leave it right here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'm going into town this afternoon. Write down anything you want me to buy you before I go. Don't be late, because I won't wait!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Wow, that was fast! Thanks, Elysium!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Going into town again? For that thing that you have... what's it called? A transmitter?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: A transmitter-receiver—or transceiver!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It's second-hand and the range is limited, but look at the case and the paint job! Don't you think it goes well with my outfit?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'll never understand your tastes...
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Bring me back some cigarettes. Same brand as last time.
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: I also want one of those hair curlers everyone's been talking about. Could you get me one?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Sure. The latest model, right? I'm on it.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hey, sonny, what about my—
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Now, who was it who asked me for cigarettes, then got caught by his family and got his allowance cut? As if I've forgotten.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Not for another forty or fifty years, at least.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The memory on you!
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Kids these days just can't let anything go...
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Ignore him. The doctor told him to stop smoking and he doesn't listen.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Here's the money for the hair curler. Thanks for that.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I'll get you the best one there is.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Now, off I go.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How many years has it been since he left home?
Three? No, he was in Columbia that third year, then went north to Sami.
The Snowpriests stopped him when he tried to go further north, so he changed course and continued on his way.
A healthy man who knows some Arts can always find a job, as long as he's not too picky.
When he ran out of money, he would find work wherever he was and save a bit before heading out again. He has seen many sights along the way.
Some places were rich and prosperous, some poor and barren.
He did not stop at this town because there was something special about it.
He just wanted to rest.
A new hair curler, and... well, I guess just a tiny little pack of cigarettes.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Still missing one component for the transceiver... hard to find an amplifier around here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hey, am I imagining things...?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Or does the sky look a little ominous to me?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Oh, it's ominous all right.
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: You think so too? Great minds think alike!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: There's something special about you, isn't there? I would've believed it if you said you just robbed the shop. I'm guessing you didn't manage to sell too much today.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It's none of your concern. We're not an ordinary shop.
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: But you've got stuff to sell, don't you?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It's...
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: It's a prophylactic that we're distributing.
attributes.name: 'Silent Lady'

attributes.content: Prophylactic? Really? It's not for Oripathy, is it?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: They say the meds that really prevent Oripathy are so expensive that only the very rich can afford them, and the stuff you can get easily on the open market doesn't actually work.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But I think I've got a good eye for people, and you don't look like hucksters to me. Are you legit?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You heard?
attributes.name: 'Silent Lady'

attributes.content: You talk a lot.
attributes.name: 'Silent Lady'

attributes.content: Just being friendly. It's my secret to getting along.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Especially when dealing with people who look dangerous, or when I see something that maybe I shouldn't have, like drugs of unknown provenance—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Maybe if I'm talkative you'll take it easier on me when you beat me to a pulp. I'm sure the gentlemen over there will, at least.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: No, I'll aim for the face.
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: Come now, say what you're really thinking, don't be shy.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But now I'm beginning to think you don't look like scammers or smugglers.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: We're not.
attributes.name: 'Silent Lady'

attributes.content: We're a... pharmaceutical company. Our mission is to eliminate the Infected problem.
attributes.name: 'Silent Lady'

attributes.content: Eliminate the Infected, or eliminate the problem? Well, I that's what I would've asked, if I didn't have what I assume to be a deep trust in you.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I suggest you watch your mouth if you don't want it punched.
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: Oh, no violence, please!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Alright, I've taken up enough of your time. I ought to be on my way.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Might be a good idea to put someone else on the front desk though, friends!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Just get lost! Mind your own business.
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: Catch.
attributes.name: 'Silent Lady'

attributes.content: Whoa! What the... huh, medicine?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: For me? Oh, you're too kind.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Three thaler.
attributes.name: 'Silent Lady'

attributes.content: You're charging money? I mean, three thaler isn't that bad...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Captain...
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: He wasn't talking to himself, was he? Was he talking to you?
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: But... how could that be?
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: Sorry, sir, but we're out of that particular ampliﬁer.
attributes.name: Hardware Shop Owner

attributes.content: Seriously? But you're my last hope!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Are you sure? You don't have one lying in a corner of a warehouse or something?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I've looked everywhere. Plus, we keep good records of all our transactions.
attributes.name: Hardware Shop Owner

attributes.content: I know, I know.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Sigh.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You've been here before. Still working on that machine you were talking about last time?
attributes.name: Hardware Shop Owner

attributes.content: Yes, the transceiver. I've been doing all the modifications myself.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I have very little experience with this stuff, but things have been going relatively smoothly, learning on the fly and doing it myself. I'm surprised that I'm learning so quickly!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'm just looking for the right amplifier to take its performance up another level.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What do you think about me becoming a Messenger? My Arts would fit right in. I was born to be one, wasn't I?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Ha, becoming a Messenger is about more than just putting together a transmitter.
attributes.name: Hardware Shop Owner

attributes.content: You've got to take exams, right? Don't worry, they used to call me Rey de los tests back home.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What does that mean?
attributes.name: Hardware Shop Owner

attributes.content: It means I'm really good at tests.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Let's get back on topic.
attributes.name: Hardware Shop Owner

attributes.content: It's not a common model, but I could try to get one for you, if you can wait.
attributes.name: Hardware Shop Owner

attributes.content: Sure, I'll be around.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That's it, then, I'll be back later—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Attention. Attention.
attributes.name: Radio Announcement

attributes.content: This is an emergency public service announcement.
attributes.name: Radio Announcement

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Serious face there. Who's the letter from?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Quiet, give me a second...
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Yes! Good news!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: What's the good news?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: I bet it's got something to do with Elysium. The signature on the letter looks like the Messenger that was reassigned to the city a while back.
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: The Catastrophe Messenger!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Elysium's been here a while. He can't stay in that little attic of ours forever.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: So I wrote a letter and the Catastrophe Messenger said Elysium could move into his house.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Really? He'd be so gracious?
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Who are you talking about? What Catastrophe Messenger?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Did we ever have one? Wasn't Elysium saying he could be the town's regular Messenger?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Well... we used to have a Catastrophe Messenger.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: The town gave him a house, hoping to entice him to stay.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: But you know those types, they won't stay in a backwater like this for long.
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: I'm getting grumpy just thinking about it. See you later.
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...Sigh.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Can't blame them, though. The big cities pay much more than we can. No way for us to stop them.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Hmph! Who cares! We have Elysium.
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: He's given himself a codename. He says the first step to becoming a professional Messenger is having a cool codename. He seems serious about it.
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: I hope so!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Say, I'm getting a bad feeling...
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Hey! Everybody!
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Go outside! Look up at the sky!
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.text: Our Catastrophe Messenger predicts that a localized Catastrophe will take place southwest of the city in a few hours.
While the Catastrophe is not expected to present a threat to the city, citizens are advised to exercise caution when going outdoors for the next few days.
In particular, we strongly advise against traveling to the southwest until further notice.

attributes.content: My supply routes don't come through the southwest.
attributes.name: Hardware Shop Owner

attributes.content: It shouldn't affect your thing—
attributes.name: Hardware Shop Owner

attributes.content: Here's the deposit! I'll be back; just get that item for me!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hey! Where are you going?!
attributes.name: Hardware Shop Owner

attributes.content: To race against a Catastrophe!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Going back now means taking a massive risk.
Elysium can't help but ask himself: Is he really that attached to the town?
Hard to say. Probably not so much that he should risk his life for it. He's only been there a few months.
But he also understands that he can't just stand by and watch, can't just wait for the storm to pass.
And there's no point in thinking about what he can't do.
He needs to focus on what he can do.
Mom, I'm scared of that big cloud in the sky...
attributes.name: Frightened Child

attributes.content: D-Don't be scared! We'll go and find dad!
attributes.name: Helpless Mother

attributes.content: Was that an earthquake?! What do we do?
attributes.name: Panicked Woman

attributes.content: Help! I'm trapped under this frame! I can't move my leg!
attributes.name: Injured Man

attributes.content: I'm coming! Hang on!
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Catastrophe! Catastrophe!
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: It was like this the last time! We need to run! As far and as fast as we can!
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Aah!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Look out!
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Whew...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That was a perfect rescue, wasn't it? A judge would've given that ten out of ten. What do you think?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Elysium! Y-You're hurt!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: What are you doing here? Didn't you go into town?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: That? Just a scratch.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I heard through the grapevine that someone needed my help—alright, I came back because I heard on the radio that this area might get hit by a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How's that? Pretty selfless, if I do say so myself.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Y-You fool! Idiot! Why did you come back?!
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Wait, why are you yelling at me?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Save the jokes, now's not the time.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Tell everyone to get ready to move... this sort type of Catastrophe will be on top of you before you know it. We don't have much time!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But where do we go?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Leave that to me.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'm an expert at surviving in the wilderness.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Stay close to me! Don't get separated!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Originium levels in the atmosphere will increase sharply in the presence of a Catastrophe, and the wind might be carrying active Originium particles. Keep yourself covered, especially any wounds!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But you just got hurt...
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Don't worry, I have a secret weapon.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Well, how about that, those meds I got are gonna come in handy!)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Let's hope they're the real deal.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Just hold on!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: We're almost... there!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Lock and bolt the door... alright, we'll be safe for now.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Is this an underground shelter?
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Yes, an abandoned one.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I never knew about this place. How did you find it?
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: I'm rather adept at pathfinding. Let me tell you, I mapped this entire area with my own two feet.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: There's nothing here I don't know about, including shelters that have been abandoned for years.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Now, please, shower me in praise.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Huh? Oh... you're amazing, Elysium!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Yup, keep going, I know you've got more in you!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Ahem... well, we definitely owe you one.
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: So we should just wait? We left in such a hurry that we didn't have time to bring a lot of supplies... how long will we be in here?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Until the Catastrophe passes and things return to normal outside, at least.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Sudden Catastrophes like this tend to go as quickly as they come.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I don't want to think about what might have happened if you didn't come back.
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: You're welcome.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But we should make a plan for future emergencies. This shelter is pretty old. It's taken a beating.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I wouldn't have picked it if there were crystal clusters growing from the ground, but fortunately that's not the case this time.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: There's just nothing we can do about Catastrophes...
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: If we had some sort of advance warning, at least...
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Don't get too down on me, bro.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That's exactly what I've been working on all this time.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That's good news. What are you fiddling with?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Just some machines... imagine that I'm yelling out in a radius of a few klicks that 'We need help here!'
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It might not be useful right now, but it never hurts to be prepared.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The earth's shaking... how long is this gonna last?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Eek! What was that noise?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Sounds like something fell...
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I'll go take a look.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The Liberi passes through the crowd of townsfolk crammed into this dark shelter.
A panicking mother holds her child tightly in her arms. The elderly sit in a corner, like a row of wrinkled statues.
Elysium can hear the occasional sob. There seems to be fewer people here than he thought there would be. He tries not to think about it.
He looks at the source of the sound. Above them is the door that they came in from. A little bit of dirt drops in with every vibration.
He gets a bad feeling.
The Liberi extends his hand.
Then he stops, stunned.
The door has been blocked by fallen rocks and can no longer be opened.
We can't get out?! How could this...
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Don't panic! Just a little hitch in the plan. We'll dig our way out.
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Relax, everyone. We still have my transceiver, and I've already sent out a distress signal. All we have to do is wait.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Really? That's great!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: (The range is limited without an amplifier, though...)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (I need to think of a way.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (I didn't manage to take the medicine either. Now my injured shoulder is starting to feel numb.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (We were in the ashring for a while. I had wrapped it in cloth, but that's not exactly enough.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Seriously? Just my luck...)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Well, maybe that's not so bad, given the situation...)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Things seem to have calmed down.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Good news. It looks like the Catastrophe has passed.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Any news?
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Not yet, but I'm happy to report that I've achieved a breakthrough in the transmission range! Help should be here soon now that the Catastrophe is over.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I hope so...
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Your wound looks worse. What about the secret weapon of yours?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Er... well, it's not time to use it yet.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll use it when I have to. When I have to.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How many layers of dirt are up there? We're not getting through!
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: We can't hold out much longer without food and water. Are you hearing anything?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Settle down. We should save our strength if there's no way through.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How are we supposed to settle down? You've been sending that signal for ages. With no response!
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: No one's coming to help us! We're all gonna starve to death here!
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: We might be able to get help if we can contact a nearby nomadic city.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That piece of junk doesn't have the range!
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Right, which is where I come in.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Everybody, listen up.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Keep your distance from me.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Keep our distance? What do you mean?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Well... I mean what I said.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Give me space. Don't come close.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How many days have we been here?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I don't think I can hold on...
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Just a bit longer!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How long do we have to wait...?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: I've got this! I'm beaming a transmission out there!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: We're done for...
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: We were always doomed, whether we stayed up there or came down here.
attributes.name: Old Townsfolk

attributes.content: Don't... *cough*... say that...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Almost... almost... we made it this far...)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Come on, don't disappoint me, 'pharmaceutical company'...)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (The wound's swollen, maybe festering, and I'm hurting all over, like that time I got run over by that contraption in Rim Billiton... worse, actually.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (My Arts are getting more powerful, though it aches when I use them.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Is this how it feels to get Oripathy?)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Looks like I won't get to use those meds after all.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What's that... sound...?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I got a response!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Response...
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Yes! A station heard me and responded!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You hear me? Hold on! Someone's coming!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It's here, right?
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: How the heck did that signal find us?
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: Is Rhodes Island so well-known already? We've only just gotten started.
attributes.name: Masked Man

attributes.content: Captain, we're reading vital signs below.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Ready to dig.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Welcome... oh, it's you, Elysium.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Morning, folks. It's been a while! Nice to see that the rebuilding is going well.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Yeah... all thanks to you. We wouldn't have made it otherwise.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: That's great! I'm glad I worked so hard.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Just simple houses to protect us from the elements. Nothing complicated.
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Where have you been?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Me? A bunch of nice people who don't look so nice dragged me away to treat my sickness. I've never seen a doctor so scary, I tell you.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Your sickness...
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Well, have a seat, er, I'll pour you a drink.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Oh, there's no need for that, I'll be going in a moment.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I just wanted to come back and say goodbye, because I'm leaving.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Y-You're leaving? But you said...
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Oh, the Messenger thing? Well, er, sorry about that.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I guess I just want to see the world, you know? Like they say, don't put a fowlbeast in a cage... well, however the saying goes.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But we haven't thanked you for saving our lives yet!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Yeah. It's just a little sickness... it's no big deal.
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: If you're leaving because you're Infected—
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: It's okay, I hear you.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But people will get scared if there's an Infected living in town. They won't want to talk.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: We're not scared!
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: I know, I know. There's always a risk, though.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Oh, don't give me that look. It's not so bad.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You remember Rhodes Island? The people who dug us out of that hole? I'm going with them.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: They're going to keep treating me. Things don't get any better than that!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Can they cure your sickness?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Well... I don't know.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Will you come back?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Of course! I'll drop by when I get some free time.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Where are you going now?
attributes.name: Strong Townsfolk

attributes.content: Well, I'm not sure.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I guess I'll go with the Rhodes Islanders for a while. I think this is the beginning of a beautiful journey.
attributes.name: Elysium
